title: Melted brie with vegetables
ingredients: ['100 g (3½ oz) thin green beans, halved', '900 g (2 lb) baking potatoes, scrubbed and cut into big wedges', '1½ tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 tsp paprika', '1 tsp salt flakes', 'few coarsely crushed black peppercorns', '2 tbsp sesame seeds', '1 small iceberg lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '½ cucumber, chopped', '225 g (8 oz) baby plum or cherry tomatoes, halved', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'salt and pepper', 'Brie dressing', '250 g (8½ oz) brie, rind removed and diced', '4 tbsp semi-skimmed milk', '1 tbsp finely chopped fresh tarragon']
